column5: Gives you an idea of the mark-up on electronics.  I would doubt that they would lose money on them, but I may be wrong.  Cheers  Craig
I was one of the last 4 or 5 to get one, I think there were 150 available. I have been checking out some american fishing sites and it was done at other BPS as well.
Yeah, this wasn't an 'accident' about running out of stock  Good show on BPS for selling these units to the lucky few that got them!

I had strolled in there on my way to buy a rod and reel when I saw the line. I asked what the line up was for. When I heard about the deal/sale......I got in line. Figured for that price....cant go wrong.  Meely

I got to the store at 9:15 am and saw the line up, walked over the marine counter and saw the stacks of Graphs...did think much of it.  Checked out some other things.  Met with my buddy there and he found out about the deal.  Once i realized how good of a deal it was, I realized how much I need a new graph   .  I was the 8th last to get one when I lined up again around 10:15.  My Buddy opted out because of 'the warden', only to find out later she told to go ahead and get one...he was a more than a little PO ed.  BL

Im  with Fang on this one. That was one of the things I was going to buy, there is no way it was a substitute as people wouldnt have benn lined up for it that night. Friends and staff, thats seems pretty shady thiere part and if it wasnt, what about  the people that were coming to buy one, now they are out of stock.  Darren
I hear you - but I'd bet the big mark-up comes in the reels, tackle, rods and clothing rather than the electronics. This could've been a huge volume purchase from Lowrance to merit the price point.

Every spring there is a line up to get into the classic.   What happend was lowrance couldnt supply the eagle so they gave them the hds5 for the same price.   Pretty sure this became aware after they printed the flyer.     The employees at bps, which are fisherpersons themselves probably got the heads up or word leaked out and thats that.   After all they are customers too.    I dunno maybe im not sour because i was able to get one.  Bps can never win with some people.   They offer a great deal which people want and they still get bashed lol

Huh? I've been a good little squirrel and was saving for a Lowrance. Not an Eagle. Its a long trip out that way for alot of people. Especially something fairly big ticket like that. Congrats on the guys that got one. Guess my trip on the 27th will still be for the 135 which will be 20$ off instead of another 100$ for the model that you guys got at what sounds like 500$ off...Theres a case there.
I just paid $1050.oo for the 7 5 is too small anyway
Nice Fish!
What happens to the people that want to get the 5 now ?  Is BPS going to up grade them to a 7 for the cost of the 5...you never know unless you ask...

i got to basspro around 8:30 and there was already about 30 people outside the door. i did not know about the sale of the hds 5 at this point so i figured everyone was just there for the sale. store opened at 9 everyone went in and i noticed a big line up at the electronics section. i wasnt sure what it was for as i was checking the flyer and didnt see anything that was that good of a deal. i noticed the stack of hds 5's lined up by the counter and saw everyone getting one and i was surprised to see so many people getting the same unit, so i asked how much they were selling them for they told me 299. i got in line quickly, the guy who i asked said they had 150 units.  i must say there may have been lots of people who knew in advance but there were also many who didnt know like me who simply were in the right place at the right time. while waiting in line you could see lots of people calling people to tell them about the sale, so i dont think everyone who got one knew about it before the store opened.  i gotta give it to basspro, i was quite pleased with the sales and i got everything i went for.  i was also told the story behind it all was same as a few have mentioned already.. the eagle unit on sale for 299 didnt come in so lowrance subsituted it with the hds 5.

I went to our Bass Pro here in Indiana yesterday to buy a couple new rods and some vibrax spinners. They had the Eagle 640 Color unit on sale for $249.00. I have a Lowrance sonar/GPS combo on my larger boat but couldn't pass up the Eagle to put on my 14' deepV. At least thats what I convinced my wife. Lots of sale prices and wall to wall people.
Why not ask for a new Nitro boat when they don't have a Jon boat in stock.
Dan.................you think that might work?!?!?!??!?!??!?!   :)

My buddy and I got 1 each today,  I was told by a BPS staff member ( cant say who)  that they were going to be a great deal..  That was 3 days ago...  I know that there are other crazy deals coming in the next couple of day, so good luck on who ever gets them  Dave  Ps  I think my buddy is selling his  but not sure.    I will ask if anyone is looking for one...
You gotta be a insider to get that kind of info I guess. Heck I always just missed the sale. If you got a extra I'll pay for your efforts and gas. Dave PM sent.

For those who 'missed' the sale and are shopping for an HDS 5, Radio World's price on them (basic US map) is $100.00 less expensive than the $800.00 charged at Bass Pro Shop. (although you can see a demo running on it there)  There were at least 2 in stock in the store yesterday (Wednesday) and some will be at the Sportsman's Show.  Radio World is not far from BPS, but know your route in advance as there is no exit going south on hwy 400 to Steeles. (not only did I miss an exit for BPS, but got to see Finch Ave twice doing a loop de loop)

I bought one here in North Bay for $500 (He was asking $700). The guy and his brother bought one each and decided to sell one. So I saved myself a few bucks and picked it up. He provided me with the reciept from Bass Pro and it comes with the full 2 year warranty. He was there for tackle and saw the line-up. He asked about it and was told the same story about the Eagle one for $299 but no stock.  Then I spent $200 on the 2010 Platinum Navionics Canada card. So now I have $700 invested in it anyways lol.
Great deal for sure...it was no accident.  I heard that a BPS employee advertised his for sale..and got canned!!! LOL It was probably the same one that gave away the "insider information".
Found out  the last minute from an insider it's gona sit beside my hds 8 on the dash of my boat
So, how many lucky OFNer's were in line for the door crasher at BPS today? It wasn't advertised but they had the Lowrance HDS 5 for 300.00 plus tx.  Man I wished I had of gone today....
wow!I was going to go but i put it off until this aft.
They were probably just selling Terry's that's full of moisture....
Can't wait to install her
I picked one up.  They sold through 150 in less than 90 min.  I picked one up from my brother who doesn't want it.  I'm going to return mine.
Wow...that is a $700+ unit if it was the HDS5 and not the HDS5x
Yes, it's the HDS 5
Heck...I would have bought one, and I don't even own a boat!
One sweet deal!  Meely
Damn
LOL...I'm waiting for the guys that picked one up for that price to start selling them for a profit. Not that I want one, but, you know it will probably happen.  What a great deal.
I could find a home for that if you want.
Dang!  I was wondering what the long line up was for.  I thought it was only $100 dollars off from $799.  I heard someone say they shipped in the HDS5 by mistake.  Dunno though.
That is ridiculous pricing! Congrats to those who got such a deal.
just wondering how guys found out about this sale and lined up with no advertising about it anywhere your response would be appreciated
Now that's a great question Malcolm...
yeah if someone told me I would pick up one for icefishing

They must have advertised it in the US for the US sale, because people were lined up the night before to get one.  I was actually at the store today before it opened and had no clue. I saw about 30 people lined up, but hadn't realized it was for that reason.   Wish I had known, I would have grabbed one myself.
any one got an extra they will sell me  email  [emailÂ protected]

sounds like a bit of inside information. If they did advertise that it would have been a stampede. I'm feeling a little sour just cause I didn't get one. So the $ I was going to spend there next weekend I'll think I'll spend at LeBarons.  I'm taking my ball and going home now!

Dam, I was up there first thing this morning as they opened and the only shoulder to shoulder line I saw was at the reel counter. I would have definately bought one as I just googled it and the first site that comes up had them for over $1000.  Dirk
Yup sweet deal indeed.   Gonna install it next month!
Can anyone that actually got one tell the rest of us that missed out how they were made aware of this great unadvertised deal.....Thanks.  Dirk
the unit is  in there flyer advertised at $ 899.99
What happened was the Eagle unit was suppose to be on sale for 299 but they didn't have any stock so to honor the deal they substitute the eagle for the HDS-5.  There was only 50 units total.
